about_the_game:
City find all is an exciting puzzle game for finding objects in a cozy town.
This game is a great way to relax after a hard day and get away from problems. Intuitive gameplay and a calm atmosphere does not bother the player and allows you to immediately immerse yourself in the process.
Melodious light music creates an atmosphere of tranquility and mystery in the game.
Some items will be easier to find. And some items will have to work hard to find! There are many objects on the location, there are numerous buildings, benches, signs, and other urban decorations. The player must explore every part of the location to find the necessary items.

Some items will be easier to find. And some items will have to work hard to find! There are many objects on the location, there are numerous buildings, benches, signs, and other urban decorations. The player must explore every part of the location to find the necessary items.
name: City find all

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10/11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K (4 * 3400) or equivalent / AMD FX-8350 (4 * 4000) or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 960 (4 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 700 MB available space

short_description: City find all is an exciting 3D puzzle game for finding objects in a cozy town. There are many objects on the location, there are numerous buildings, benches, signs, and other urban decorations. The player must explore every part of the location to find the necessary items.
